title: LOL Anthroposophy!
description: Orac has a nice post explaining that homeopathy is a big part of the education naturopaths get at their wacky schools. Some naturopaths a...
cleaned_text: is a big part of the education naturopaths get at their wacky schools. Some naturopaths also study anthroposophy, as do some real doctors, particularly those at the [University of Michigan Medical School.](http://www.med.umich.edu/umim/resources/anthroposophic_medicine.htm) What's anthroposophy, you ask? Well in short: anthroposophy = homeopathy + ghosts. Obviously adding ghosts to homeopathy does not dilute the stupid in any measurable way. How can a reputable medical school like U Michigan suddenly go full-on moonbat? Well, in my clinical experience, rich wankers are usually involved. People like Oprah, Mercola, Chopra, Huffington, and Prince Charles want to make the world a better place. The "transformation of medicine" is their wedge strategy. By getting faith healing into science they hope to guide the rest of us toward better spiritual practice. It's kind of like when you were a kid and that creepy old guy made touching the no-no place seem good instead of bad. All it took was a little candy and repetition. Hey you, smile! Billionaires do not like a negative attitude. Negativity can get you fired; just ask Orac. I copypasta'd a handy membership list from the [Physician's Association for Anthroposophic Medicine and Self-Inflicted Head Injury](http://www.paam.net/find-a-physician.html), to get the positivity and up-toned laughing started: California Michael Allen MD 11344 Coloma Rd River, CA, 95670 Tel: 916-803-7040 Fax: 916-852-7041 lazarallen@gmail.com Tiffany CA, 94708 Tel: 530-400-3797 tiffanybaermd@yahoo.com Daniel Brousseau DO 91104 Tel: 626-794-4668 Fax: 626-345-9753 Gershan 650-573-3402 Fax: 650-573-2919 dgershan@sbcglobal.net Melanie Tel: 310-451-8880 Fax: 310-451-8803 Claire Leve 95602 Tel: 530-886-6555 Fax: 530-886-6586 Patricia Reber-Weltz Tel: 650-559-8500 Fax: 650-823-4940 Sunjya K. 94952 Tel: 707-778-3171 Fax: 707-778-6744 dr@drschweig.com M.
